mapper.insert: insert into purchase( purchase_no, purchase_name, purchase_qty, purchase_total_price, purchase_status, purchase_payment, purchase_used_point, purchase_cash_pay, purchase_expire ) values( #{purchaseNo}, #{purchaseName}, #{purchaseQty}, #{purchaseTotalPrice}, #{purchaseStatus}, #{purchasePayment}, #{purchaseUsedPoint}, #{purchaseCashPay}, #{purchaseExpire} )
mapper.select: select * from purchase order by purchase_no asc
